# PED::ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES

## Summary
Applies a decoration (tattoos, patches, etc.) to the specified ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped: Index - the index of the ped to apply the decoration decal to
* **INT** collectionNameHash: The hash of the name of the collection where the preset to apply is stored
* **INT** presetNameHash: The hash of the name of the preset to apply

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Same as ADD_PED_DECORATION, but with hashes

Applies an Item from a PedDecorationCollection to a ped. These include tattoos and shirt decals.

collection - PedDecorationCollection filename hash
overlay - Item name hash

Example:
Entry inside "mpbeach_overlays.xml" -
<Item>
  <uvPos x="0.500000" y="0.500000" />
  <scale x="0.600000" y="0.500000" />
  <rotation value="0.000000" />
  <nameHash>FM_Hair_Fuzz</nameHash>
  <txdHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txdHash>
  <txtHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txtHash>
  <zone>ZONE_HEAD</zone>
  <type>TYPE_TATTOO</type>
  <faction>FM</faction>
  <garment>All</garment>
  <gender>GENDER_DONTCARE</gender>
  <award />
  <awardLevel />
</Item>

Code:
PED::ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("mpbeach_overlays"), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("fm_hair_fuzz"))

Full list of ped overlays / decorations by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/pedOverlayCollections.json
